Title: Shodan Firehose
Description:
A quick demo of the Shodan firehose: how to filter it by various properties such as port or country, store the data in a local directory and get a glimpse at all the information that can be retrieved in real-time from the raw data.

Uses the Shodan command-line interface to access the stream: https://cli.shodan.io

Documentation on all available streams at: https://developer.shodan.io/api/stream
